text: David Gene Pearson (December 22, 1934 - November 12, 2018) was an American stock car racer. He was born in Spartanburg, South Carolina. He began his NASCAR career in 1960 and won the 1960 NASCAR Rookie of the Year award. Pearson won three championships (1966, 1968, and 1969) in NASCAR's Grand National Series (now Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series). In 2011, he was added to the NASCAR Hall of Fame. Pearson died on November 12, 2018 in Spartanburg at the age of 83.David Pearson, NASCAR's Silver Fox, has died at 83 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2018 deaths Category:NASCAR drivers Category:Sportspeople from South Carolina Category:People from Spartanburg, South Carolina
title: David Pearson
